function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Panic buying leading to long queues and abandoned groceries","Impact":"Wastage of food, deprived other shoppers","Mitigation":"Imposing purchase limits, reassurance from political leaders and retailers","Technologies":"Not specified","People":"Customers, shoppers","Owner":"Retailers, political leaders"},{"Description":"High demand for groceries leading to crowded supermarkets","Impact":"Increased transmission risks","Mitigation":"Implementation of social distancing measures, scheduled shopping days, encouraging shopping alone","Technologies":"Not specified","People":"Government, grocery shoppers","Owner":"Government, supermarkets"},{"Description":"Elderly shoppers still going to crowded places","Impact":"Increased risk of infection for the elderly","Mitigation":"Encouraging the elderly to stay away from crowds and be safe at home","Technologies":"Not specified","People":"Elderly shoppers","Owner":"Government"}]}
